"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b2b5fd6368727dd60001df#post_55b2b5fd6368727dd60001df
Well the reason free-range isn't a more wide-spread thing is two-fold.
One. It's expensive. Like REALLY fucking expenisve. If all chicken were free-range chicken and egg prices would at the very least DOUBLE.

Two. Chickens are DOUCHEBAGS. Especially to other chickens.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b2b83f63687273ae0000df#post_55b2b83f63687273ae0000df
I remember sometime last year my mom brought home one of her Bosses poor chickens with her.

She was picking us up so we could go with her to get the chicken checked out. Apparently the other ones Plucked some of her feathers out. Apparently when chickens do that it might mean something is wrong with that said chicken.

Like maybe its sick or something. 


*THAT WAS A FAT ASS CHICKEN*
